body_html:
I agree with @drpngx 's comment that cmake support is not perfect. It is also under contrib, so any contributions there are welcome.
Im not sure about separating those out of the cmake file though. Especially contrib is under very heavy development, and as things are added and removed people just forget updating all references to those.

body:
I agree with @drpngx 's comment that cmake support is not perfect. It is also under contrib, so any contributions there are welcome.
Im not sure about separating those out of the cmake file though. Especially contrib is under very heavy development, and as things are added and removed people just forget updating all references to those.
